attributes.action: Stop Lorries overtaking at peak traffic times on Motorways and Dual Carriageways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Introduce a peak time no overtaking rule on Motorways and Dual Carriageways for Large Goods Vehicles. Apply it between 07.00 and 09.00 and 16.00 to 19.00 daily, it would improve safety and congestion on our congested roads. It is used extensively in Europe, and works very well.
